Key Match Events: The match was abandoned without a ball bowled due to persistent rain and a soggy outfield at the MCG.
Pre-Game Insights: A win for England would have been better for their hopes of a top-two finish in the group and a semi-final place.
Post-Match Reflections: The result means the group remains wide open with four teams on three points and the bottom two on two.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England remain level on three points with Australia and currently have a better net run-rate.
Others: England face an intriguing rendezvous with ex-coach Chris Silverwood, now at Sri Lanka, who might relish the chance to get one over on his old employers.
